content:
They arrived 59, including 25 children and 6 people with disabilities.

About thisShe reported March 24State Emergency Service.

In addition to people on the train, 3 dogs arrived.

Rescuers, psychologists, together with police officers, volunteers of the Red Cross, representatives of local authorities and charitable organizations, helped get out of the train, move things, and provide psychological assistance.

Asreported the armyinform, in three settlements of Sumy region, a forced evacuation of children was announced due to enemy shelling.
title: In Rivne, an evacuation train from Donetsk was met
description: This was reported on March 24 by the State Emergency Service. In addition to people in ...
author: Army Inform
